demos.title: Online Demo — Example #2 (8 stages, 3 moves, 2 rounds)
demos.description: Based on the owner’s Example #2. Uses move demo videos as placeholders for the move clips.

demos.title: Gym Demo — Example #1 (6 stations, 2 moves, 4 rounds per move)
demos.description: Based on the owner’s Example #1. Station board shows assigned station moves; timer drives rounds, move slot A/B, and rotation transitions.

demos.title: Online Quick Demo (10s work / 5s rest)
demos.description: Short demo to quickly verify beeps, volume, and segment transitions.
